channel.title: Epic-Games-Store on Arrans github.io
channel.description: Recent content in Epic-Games-Store on Arrans github.io

item.title: claabs/epicgames-freegames-node
item.description: Automatically login and find available free games the Epic Games Store. Sends you a prepopulated checkout link so you can complete the checkout after logging in. Supports multiple accounts, login sessions, and scheduled runs.
